rev.comment: Avoiding use of page title in section headings, per [[Wikipedia:Manual_of_Style_%28headings%29#Wording]]
using CSS rather than deprecated "center" HTML tags
use standard cite templates per FA demotion notes

/* Rainbows in popular culture */ removed another non-notable and non-relevent (to the section) image.
/* Rainbows in art */ also removed slightly informal text regarding photography of rainbows and (as far as I know) non notable photographer. seemed a bit self promotional.
/* Rainbows in art */ removed image of the rainbow in a park sprinkler by wiki contributor. Not really relevent to the section as it is not art in the classic sense described here.

/* The sequence of colours */ take out plausibility opinion, and paragraph break
/* The sequence of colours */ take out the electronic color code nonsense, which is logically backwards
/* The sequence of colours */ revert incited revision, see the extensive discussions of the sequence.
mist -> spray; is the new picture unnecessary (see [[Talk:Rainbow|talk]] page)
redundant picture, but nice; but at least don't put extra comma in the caption
/* Variations */ moved all the images back onto a single line - looks a LOT neater
